name: Refinery
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The refinery has a hot, industrial atmosphere with the scent of molten metal and the constant roar of machinery processing raw materials. The air carries the promise of valuable products and the essential nature of material processing, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of industrial transformation and the danger of working with hazardous materials.
